attributes.action: Ban parents from running their children to school and encourage a school bus scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A daily trip of 12 miles to Birmingham on the A38 Bristol Road South can take as much as an hour and a half during term time. During the Summer holidays this time is greatly reduced. Clearly the 'School Run' is responsible for choking our roads

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
